comment.author: 25695066@N00
comment._content: SS Barossa was heavily damaged in Darwin Harbor by the Japanese during their raid on Darwin on February 19, 1942.  Aircraft from the Imperial Japanese Navy and the Imperial Japanese Army Air Service (Imperial Japanese Air Force) took part in the bombing and strafing of the city and harbor.  SS Barossa would be salvaged.

comment.author: 35390608@N04
comment._content: I worked on her sister the "Barwon"...she was attacked by a submarine 2ww...my father was on the Barossa

comment.author: 92116916@N03
comment._content: my dad was on it to

comment.author: 35390608@N04
comment._content: that was good to hear, not too many sailors still around that were on those old steamers...I was on a few of them
